message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product for a price of $1,600,000. It's a significant asset that I believe will be highly beneficial to your operations.  This price reflects the inherent value of the product and provides a fair return on my investment.  I understand this is a significant decision, so please take your time to consider.  If you decline, I have a standing offer from another buyer at $1,500,000. Let me know your decision.
